Package to.us.resume_builder.presentation

Class EditorCategoryHeader

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
to.us.resume_builder.presentation.EditorCategoryHeader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class EditorCategoryHeader
extends javax.swing.JPanel
Header for all Category editors (in the EditStage). Gives user interface for generic Category edits (editing name, display name, and visibility of a category, as well as deletion of the category).
Author:
Micah Schiewe, Jacob Curtis
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  EditorCategoryHeader.DeleteCategory
    A handle used by the EditorCategoryHeader to report that the user has decided to delete the currently-selected Category.

  • Constructor Details

    • EditorCategoryHeader

      public EditorCategoryHeader​(Category startingCategory, EditorCategoryHeader.DeleteCategory deleteHandle)
      Creates a new EditorCategoryHeader, prepared to perform generic Category edits on startingCategory.
      Parameters:
      startingCategory - The category the editor defaults to editing. This cannot be null.
      deleteHandle - The method to call to delete the category being edited. This should be a lambda passed from the creating function which removes the category, and also facilitates a callback to load a new category to display.

  • Method Details

    • updateHeader

      public void updateHeader​(Category newCategory)
      Updates this header with the data in the new Category to render.
      Parameters:
      newCategory - The new category to display and edit.

      Saves the currently-edited data to the resume in RAM.
